casebody.data:
ELLIOTT, et al.
v.
COUNTY OF HALIFAX. No. 590P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 7, 2005. John W. O'Tuel, III, Raleigh, for The County of Halifax. Janet Dudley, Bradley A. Elliott, Roanoke Rapids, for Elliott et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of December 2004 by Defendant for Leave to File Reply to Appellee's Response to Appellant's Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of January 2005."
